statements: SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY description ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%purchase%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND amount < 500;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN payments ON transactions.transaction_id = payments.transaction_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000 ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, payments.amount, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-12-31'

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.description, payments.payment_date FROM transactions JOIN payments ON transactions.transaction_id = payments.transaction_id WHERE payments.amount < 500 ORDER BY transactions.transaction_id ASC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%refund%'
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE status = 'paid' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE method = 'Credit Card' AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%refund%' OR description LIKE '%return%';
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 500;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT description FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'savings');
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%expenses%';
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT payment_date, payment_method, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT account_id, account_holder, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.category_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transactions_categories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id INNER JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id
